teacherInstructions.description: Indicates the max dimension for images in teacher instructions
teacherInstructions.title: teacherInstructions

prompt.description: Indicates the max dimension for images in prompt - this is also the default dimension for all other input fields if it's not specified
prompt.title: prompt

rationale.description: Indicates the max dimension for images in rationale
rationale.title: rationale

choicesWithPlacementArea.description: Only available for the width prop: indicates the max width for images in choices and choices labels when placement area is enabled
choicesWithPlacementArea.title: choicesWithPlacementArea

choicesWithoutPlacementArea.description: Only available for the width prop: indicates the max width for images in choices and choices labels when placement area is disabled
choicesWithoutPlacementArea.title: choicesWithoutPlacementArea

choices.description: Only available for the height prop: indicates the max height for images in choices and choices labels
choices.title: choices
